column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////All of the ramen that I have had was very tasty and quite substantial. If you come here
column2: make sure to differentiate the ramen that has the thin or thick noodles. For me
column4: since I like the bit of elasticity and chewiness that is a bit lacking in the thinner type noodles. The broth
column6: tastes almost like it is made from a paste instead of slowly boiling down the bones and other cuts of meat.
